title: Gastrointestinal Aspergillosis (Tridosha Atisara) -
description: Gastrointestinal aspergillosis is one of the rare, but complicated conditions affecting the GI tract. It is defined as the inflammation of the gastrointestinal tract caused by the fungi Aspergillus.
cleaned_text: of the rare, but complicated conditions affecting the GI tract... Dr. Sahil Gupta (B.A.M.S., M.H.A.) No Comments
